messages.content: डेल्टाटी  कसा पहावा
messages.en: How to watch Deltati
messages.standalone_question: How can I observe the Delta variant?
messages.standalone_en: How can I observe the Delta variant?

messages.content:
डेल्टाटी (Delta T) म्हणजे हवा आणि पाण्याच्या तापमानातील फरक. याचा उपयोग पाण्याच्या स्प्रे करण्याच्या योग्यतेसाठी केला जातो. डेल्टाटी कमी असल्यास, स्प्रे करण्याची स्थिती चांगली असते. 

तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी डेल्टाटी कसा आहे हे तपासण्यासाठी, मला तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी सध्याच्या हवामानाच्या डेटाची आवश्यकता आहे. तुम्ही कोणत्या प्लॉटसाठी माहिती पाहू इच्छिता?
messages.en:
Delta T is the difference between the temperature of air and water. It is used for the ability to spray water. If delta is low, spraying conditions are better. 

To check what deltaty is like for your plot, I need current weather data for your plot. What plot information would you like to see?

messages.content: Ard 26
messages.en: Ard 26
messages.standalone_question: What is the Delta T for plot Ard 26?
messages.standalone_en: What is the Delta T for plot Ard 26?

messages.content: "Plot no.2 ARD 36" साठी स्प्रे करण्याच्या स्थितीची माहिती तपासता येत नाही. कृपया काही वेळाने पुन्हा प्रयत्न करा किंवा दुसऱ्या प्लॉटसाठी माहिती विचारू शकता.

messages.content: Maru upkaran kam kari rahyu che
messages.en: My device is working

messages.content: Agar tamaru Kairo/Nero upkaran kam nahi kari rahyu che, to tamare Fyllo app ma support ticket upar karvu pade. Jo samasya hal na thaye, to Fyllo customer support ne sampark karva maate kahu chu.
messages.en: If your Cairo/Nero device isn't working, you'll need to put the files on the support ticket in APP. If the problem doesn't exist, I ask the files to contact customer support.

messages.content: केळी मध्ये तणनाशक मारले चालेलका
messages.en: Can weedicides be killed in bananas?
messages.standalone_question: Is it permissible to use pesticides on bananas?
messages.standalone_en: Is it permissible to use pesticides on bananas?

messages.content:
केळीच्या पिकात तणनाशक वापरणे योग्य आहे, परंतु त्यासाठी काही गोष्टींचा विचार करावा लागतो. तणनाशकाची निवड करताना त्याची पिकाशी सुसंगतता आणि वापरण्याची योग्य पद्धत यांचा विचार करा. 

तणनाशक वापरण्यापूर्वी, तुमच्या पिकाच्या स्थितीचा आणि तणांच्या प्रकाराचा विचार करा. तुम्हाला अधिक माहिती हवी असल्यास, कृपया Fyllo च्या CRM नंबरवर संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
It is advisable to use herbicides in banana crops, but there are a few things to consider. When choosing a herbicide, consider its consistency with the crop and the right method of use. 

Before using a herbicide, consider the condition of your crop and the type of weed. If you would like more information, please contact Fyllo's CRM number.

messages.content: दोन नंबर डिवाईस चालत नाही
messages.en: The number two device doesn't work
messages.standalone_question: The device number two is not working.
messages.standalone_en: The device number two is not working.

messages.content:
आपण आपल्या Nero डिवाईससाठी काही उपाय करू शकता:

1. **डिवाईस कनेक्शन तपासा**: सुनिश्चित करा की डिवाईस अॅपशी जोडलेले आहे.
2. **नेटवर्क कनेक्टिव्हिटी**: इंटरनेट कनेक्शन तपासा.
3. **बॅटरी स्थिती**: बॅटरीची स्थिती तपासा, ती कमी असल्यास चार्ज करा.
4. **डिवाईस रीस्टार्ट करा**: डिवाईस रीस्टार्ट करून पहा.

जर या उपायांनी समस्या सुटली नाही, तर कृपया Fyllo ग्राहक समर्थनाशी संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
Here are some measures you can do for your Nero device:

1. **Check the device connection**: Make sure the device is connected to the app.
2. **Network connectivity**: Check internet connection.
3. **Battery status**: Check the battery position, charge if it's low.
4. **Restart the device**: Try the device restart.

If these measures do not solve the problem, please contact Fyllo Customer Support.

messages.content: Divase not working
messages.en: Divase not working

messages.content:
It seems like you're facing an issue with the irrigation system (Divase). Let's check the live sensor data for your plot "Om Farm" to identify any potential problems. Please hold on for a moment.:

The live sensor data for your plot "Om Farm" shows the following:

- **Soil Temperature:** 23.81°C
- **Soil Moisture (Sensor 1):** 79% (indicating wet soil)
- **Soil Moisture (Sensor 2):** 79% (indicating wet soil)
- **Battery Level:** 61%
- **Solar Voltage:** 3909 mV

Since the soil moisture is quite high (79%), the irrigation system may not be activating because the soil is already wet. If you believe the system should be working, please check the following:

1. **Power Supply:** Ensure that the irrigation system is receiving power.
2. **Settings:** Verify the irrigation settings to ensure they are configured correctly.
3. **Physical Inspection:** Check for any blockages or issues in the irrigation lines.

If everything seems fine and the issue persists, you may need to consult a technician for further assistance.

messages.content: 5day in 79%
messages.en: 5day in 79%
messages.standalone_question: Why has the soil moisture remained at 79% for five days?
messages.standalone_en: Why has the soil moisture remained at 79% for five days?

tools:
get_hourly_soil_moisture_data  
Retrieves historical hourly soil moisture data from soil moisture sensors, in kPa or percentage. Provides soilMoisture1 and soilMoisture2 fields only. Suitable for less than 5 days duration.

get_daily_soil_moisture_data  
Retrieves historical daily soil moisture data from soil moisture sensors, in kPa or percentage. Provides soilMoisture1 and soilMoisture2 fields only. Suitable for larger duration.
faq:
Q: I irrigated still the sensor is dropping slowly.
A: Sometimes, the water reaches slowly till root zone and the moisture sensor kPa value drops slowly. Always wait for 12 hours after irrigation for the moisture to saturate. If still some confusion, ask user to check moisture near the sensor and check if he wants to raise a ticket for the issue.

Q: In the latest irrigation , sensor didn't drop to 0.
A: 0 to 5 Kpa means soil is fully wet. It need not drop to 0 every time. Moisture less than 5 also means wet conditions. So, need not worry. Also ask to wait for 12 hours after irrigation.

Q: Sensor is showing dry, but it rained recently.
A: Rainwater doesn't percolate well in the soil. Most of it runs off. After a day of rain stops , if the sensor is still dry, you will have to irrigate. You can check the moisture by digging near the sensor . Irrigate accordingly.

Q: How do I know if my soil  moisture sensor is working fine ?
A: The only way to know is if after irrigation the sensor is dropping below 5 kpa and increasing continuously unless next irrigation is done. You can try putting water on the sensor and it should drop. Also, there should not be any fluctuations in the soil moisture data and the pressure kpa should always be increasing. Also, a soil moisture reading of 0 kPa is perfectly fine, meaning wet soil, but a reading of 200 kPa could mean fault. If the soil moisture sensor reading is consistently at 0 from few 48 hours, then it could be anamolous (use live and historical hourly soil moisture data (use tool) to validate).

Q: What is my soil moisture depletion?
A: Soil moisture depletion %age = (100 - soil moisture %age)

messages.content:
If your soil moisture has been consistently at 79% for the last 5 days, it indicates that the soil is quite wet. This level of moisture is generally good for your grape crop, as it suggests that the plants are receiving adequate water.

However, if you are concerned about the moisture levels or if you notice any signs of overwatering (like yellowing leaves or root rot), you may want to consider the following:

1. **Wait for 12 Hours:** After irrigation, it's important to wait for at least 12 hours for the moisture to stabilize.
2. **Monitor Soil Moisture:** Keep an eye on the soil moisture readings. If it remains high for an extended period, you may need to adjust your irrigation schedule.
3. **Check for Drainage:** Ensure that your plot has proper drainage to prevent waterlogging.

If you have any specific concerns or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
messages.en:
If your soil moisture has been consistently at 79% for the last 5 days, it indicates that the soil is quite wet. This level of moisture is generally good for your grape crop, as it suggests that the plants are receiving adequate water.

However, if you are concerned about the moisture levels or if you notice any signs of overwatering (like yellowing leaves or root rot), you may want to consider the following:

1. **Wait for 12 Hours:** After irrigation, it's important to wait for at least 12 hours for the moisture to stabilize.
2. **Monitor Soil Moisture:** Keep an eye on the soil moisture readings. If it remains high for an extended period, you may need to adjust your irrigation schedule.
3. **Check for Drainage:** Ensure that your plot has proper drainage to prevent waterlogging.

If you have any specific concerns or need further assistance, feel free to ask!

messages.content: ડેલાડા ડી શુ છે
messages.en: Delada de Shu is

messages.content:
ડેલાડા ડી એટલે કે "ડેલાડા ડી" એ એક પ્રકારની ખેતીની પદ્ધતિ છે, જેમાં જમીનને યોગ્ય રીતે તૈયાર કરવામાં આવે છે અને પાકને યોગ્ય રીતે ઉગાડવામાં આવે છે. આ પદ્ધતિમાં જમીનનું સ્વાસ્થ્ય, પાણીની જરૂરિયાત, ખાતરનો ઉપયોગ અને જીવાણુઓના નિયંત્રણ જેવા મુદ્દાઓનો સમાવેશ થાય છે. 

જો તમને વિશેષ માહિતી જોઈએ છે, તો કૃપા કરીને સ્પષ્ટ કરો કે તમે કઈ વિશેષ માહિતી શોધી રહ્યા છો.
messages.en:
Delada D i.e. "Delada D" is a type of farming method in which the soil is prepared properly and the crop is grown properly. This system includes issues such as soil health, water requirement, fertilizer use and control of bacteria. 

If you want specific information, please specify what particular information you are looking for.

messages.content: Abhi khet me kon sa fertilizer use kre
messages.en: Which fertilizer should be used in the field now?
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I use in the field right now?
messages.standalone_en: What fertilizer should I use in the field right now?

faq:
Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17
Or 0.40.37, 0.40.40, 0.49.32, 0.52.34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0.55.18, 0.60.20, 0.9.46, 10.26.26, 10.54.10, 11.44.11, 12.11.18, 12.32.16, 12.61.0, 13.0.45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13.40.13, 19.19.19, 20.20.0.13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24.24.0, 30.10.10, 6.34.17

messages.content: "महादेववाड़ी" खेत के लिए वर्तमान में कोई विशेष फर्टिगेशन डेटा उपलब्ध नहीं है। आपको अपने फसल के लिए उपयुक्त उर्वरक की जानकारी के लिए स्थानीय कृषि विशेषज्ञ से संपर्क करने की सलाह दी जाती है।

messages.standalone_en: Do I need fertilizer in my field?

faq:
Q: Do I need to do fertigation on my farm?
A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

messages.content_transliterated: mara khetar man khatar knee jarur khari

messages.content:
હા, તમારા ખેતરમાં ખાતરની જરૂર છે. હાલમાં, તમે "મસકમેલોન" પાકના "વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ" તબક્કામાં છો, જે 1લી સપ્તાહમાં છે. 

### હાલની ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:
1. **1મો દિવસ (22 માર્ચ 2025)**:
   - **ફર્ટિલાઇઝર**: 
     - 12-61-0: 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
     - અથવા
     - 24-24-0: 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર + ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%: 2 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
     - અથવા
     - યુરિયા: 1.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર + ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%: 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **નોંધ**: ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશનથી 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવી જોઈએ.

2. **4મો દિવસ (25 માર્ચ 2025)**:
   - સમાન ફર્ટિલાઇઝર વિકલ્પો.

### આગામી ફર્ટિગેશન:
- **2મો સપ્તાહ**:
  - 1મો દિવસ: મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર + અમોનિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 6.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
  - 4મો દિવસ: સમાન ફર્ટિલાઇઝર વિકલ્પો.

આ માહિતી અનુસાર, ખાતર આપવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.
messages.en:
Yes, your farm needs fertilizer. Currently, you are in the "vegetative growth" stage of the "muscamalone" crop, which is in the 1st week. 

### Current Fertigation Schedule:
1. **1st Day (22 March 2025)**:
   - **Fertilizer**: 
     12-61-0: 3 kg/acre
     -or
     24-24-0: 3 kg/acre + phosphoric acid 80%: 2 kg/acre
     -or
     Urea: 1.5 kg/acre + phosphoric acid 80%: 3 kg/acre
   * *Note**: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before the application of other fertilizers.

2. **4th Day (25 March 2025)**:
   - Similar fertilizer options.

### Upcoming Fertigation:
- **2nd week**:
  Day 1: Magnesium sulfate: 3 kg/acre + Ammonium sulfate: 6.5 kg/acre
  Day 4: Similar fertilizer options.

According to this information, it is important to give fertilizer.

messages.content: મારાં ખેતર માં પાણી ની જરૂર ક્યારે છે
messages.en: When do I need water in my farm?
messages.standalone_question: When does my field need water?
messages.standalone_en: When does my field need water?

tools:
should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.
faq:
Q: When should I water? (Hindi: Paani kab dun?)
A: 0-5 kPa is wet, and increasing kPa means increasing dryness. The crop should stay in its optimal moisture zone, and when very close or above the dry optimal moisture, water can be given. Check internal irrigation forecast for the correct answer.

Q: Why should I water my crop?
A: Watering your crop is essential to maintain the right moisture balance for healthy growth. Fyllo provides soil monitoring sensors that can provide irrigation precise requirement forecasting. The forecast will also provide the details for why and when you should irrigate.

Q: How much to irrigate after receiving notification?
A: The net quantity of water to be applied depends on the moisture deficit in the soil, leaching requirement, and expectancy of rainfall. When no rainfall is expected and the soil is not saline, the net quantity equals the moisture deficit in the soil.

Q: In the latest irrigation , sensor didn't drop to 0.
A: 0 to 5 Kpa means soil is fully wet. It need not drop to 0 every time. Moisture less than 5 also means wet conditions. So, need not worry. Also ask to wait for 12 hours after irrigation.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows wet values?
A: Verify the irrigation frequency, check the installation point, and contact Fyllo representative if the issue persists.

messages.content_transliterated: maran khetar man pani knee jarur kyare che

messages.content:
તમારા "ઘર વાળો પ્લોટ" માં હાલની જમીનની ભેજની સ્થિતિ નીચે મુજબ છે:

- **મૂળભૂત ભેજ (Sensor 1)**: 62% (આપણે 90% (વેટ) થી 50% (ડ્રાય) વચ્ચે irrigate કરવું જોઈએ)
- **મૂળભૂત ભેજ (Sensor 2)**: 47% (આપણે 90% (વેટ) થી 50% (ડ્રાય) વચ્ચે irrigate કરવું જોઈએ)

### પાણી આપવાની જરૂર:
- **Sensor 1**: 62% - આ ભેજનું સ્તર યોગ્ય છે, પરંતુ જો તે 50% ની નીચે જાય તો પાણી આપવું જોઈએ.
- **Sensor 2**: 47% - આ ભેજનું સ્તર ઓછું છે, તેથી આ જમીનને પાણી આપવાની જરૂર છે.

### ભવિષ્યમાં પાણી આપવાની ભવિષ્યવાણી:
- જો ભેજનું સ્તર 50% ની નીચે જાય, તો પાણી આપવું જરૂરી છે. 

તેથી, હાલમાં Sensor 2 માટે પાણી આપવું જરૂરી છે.
messages.en:
The current soil moisture status in your "home plot" is as follows:

* **Basic Humidity (Sensor 1)**: 62% (we should irrigate between 90% (VAT) and 50% (dry))
* **Basic Humidity (Sensor 2)**: 47% (we should irrigate between 90% (VAT) and 50% (dry))

### Need to water:
- **Sensor 1**: 62% - This humidity level is correct, but water should be given if it falls below 50%.
* *Sensor 2**: 47% - This moisture level is low, so this soil needs to be watered.

### Prediction of future watering:
- If the humidity level falls below 50%, watering is necessary. 

Therefore, it is currently necessary to water for Sensor 2.

messages.content: મારા ખેતર માં ખાતર ની જરૂર ખરી
messages.en: I really need manure in my farm.
messages.standalone_question: Do I need fertilizer in my field?
messages.standalone_en: Do I need fertilizer in my field?

faq:
Q: Do I need to do fertigation on my farm?
A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

messages.content_transliterated: mara khetar man khatar knee jarur khari

messages.content:
હા, તમારા ખેતરમાં ખાતરની જરૂર છે. હાલમાં, તમે "મસકમેલોન" પાકના "વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ" તબક્કામાં છો, જે 1લી સપ્તાહમાં છે. 

### હાલની ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:
1. **1મો દિવસ (22 માર્ચ 2025)**:
   - **ફર્ટિલાઇઝર**: 
     - 12-61-0: 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
     - અથવા
     - 24-24-0: 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર + ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%: 2 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
     - અથવા
     - યુરિયા: 1.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર + ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%: 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **નોંધ**: ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ અન્ય ખાતરોની એપ્લિકેશનથી 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા અલગથી લાગુ કરવી જોઈએ.

2. **4મો દિવસ (25 માર્ચ 2025)**:
   - સમાન ફર્ટિલાઇઝર વિકલ્પો.

### આગામી ફર્ટિગેશન:
- **2મો સપ્તાહ**:
  - 1મો દિવસ: મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર + અમોનિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 6.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
  - 4મો દિવસ: સમાન ફર્ટિલાઇઝર વિકલ્પો.

આ માહિતી અનુસાર, ખાતર આપવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.
messages.en:
Yes, your farm needs fertilizer. Currently, you are in the "vegetative growth" stage of the "muscamalone" crop, which is in the 1st week. 

### Current Fertigation Schedule:
1. **1st Day (22 March 2025)**:
   - **Fertilizer**: 
     12-61-0: 3 kg/acre
     -or
     24-24-0: 3 kg/acre + phosphoric acid 80%: 2 kg/acre
     -or
     Urea: 1.5 kg/acre + phosphoric acid 80%: 3 kg/acre
   * *Note**: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before the application of other fertilizers.

2. **4th Day (25 March 2025)**:
   - Similar fertilizer options.

### Upcoming Fertigation:
- **2nd week**:
  Day 1: Magnesium sulfate: 3 kg/acre + Ammonium sulfate: 6.5 kg/acre
  Day 4: Similar fertilizer options.

According to this information, it is important to give fertilizer.

messages.en: There is no need for any medicine or spray in your farm (home plot) this week (March 22, 2025 to March 29, 2025). If any new information is found, I will let you know.

messages.content: મારાં ખેતર માં પાણી ની જરૂર ક્યારે છે
messages.en: When do I need water in my farm?
messages.standalone_question: When does my field need water?
messages.standalone_en: When does my field need water?

tools:
should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.
faq:
Q: When should I water? (Hindi: Paani kab dun?)
A: 0-5 kPa is wet, and increasing kPa means increasing dryness. The crop should stay in its optimal moisture zone, and when very close or above the dry optimal moisture, water can be given. Check internal irrigation forecast for the correct answer.

Q: Why should I water my crop?
A: Watering your crop is essential to maintain the right moisture balance for healthy growth. Fyllo provides soil monitoring sensors that can provide irrigation precise requirement forecasting. The forecast will also provide the details for why and when you should irrigate.

Q: How much to irrigate after receiving notification?
A: The net quantity of water to be applied depends on the moisture deficit in the soil, leaching requirement, and expectancy of rainfall. When no rainfall is expected and the soil is not saline, the net quantity equals the moisture deficit in the soil.

Q: In the latest irrigation , sensor didn't drop to 0.
A: 0 to 5 Kpa means soil is fully wet. It need not drop to 0 every time. Moisture less than 5 also means wet conditions. So, need not worry. Also ask to wait for 12 hours after irrigation.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows wet values?
A: Verify the irrigation frequency, check the installation point, and contact Fyllo representative if the issue persists.

messages.content:
મને આપેલ છબીમાં પાકની આરોગ્યની ચોક્કસ મૂલ્યાંકન કરવા માટે પૂરતી સ્પષ્ટતા નથી. કૃપા કરીને નીચેના સૂચનોને અનુસરો:

1. **ફોકસ**: ખાતરી કરો કે અસરગ્રસ્ત વિસ્તાર સ્પષ્ટ ફોકસમાં છે.
2. **અંતર**: છબીને નજીકથી ખેંચો જેથી ચોક્કસ લક્ષણો અથવા સમસ્યાઓને હાઇલાઇટ કરી શકાય.
3. **પ્રકાશ**: સારી પ્રકાશનથી કોઈપણ રંગ બદલાવ અથવા નુકસાન ઓળખવામાં મદદ મળશે.

કૃપા કરીને વધુ સ્પષ્ટ છબી પ્રદાન કરો જેથી વધુ ચોક્કસ મૂલ્યાંકન કરી શકાય.
messages.en:
The image given to me does not have enough clarity to accurately assess the health of the crop. Please follow the instructions below:

1. **Focus**: Make sure the affected area is in clear focus.
2. **Distance**: Pull the image closely so as to highlight specific features or problems.
3. **Light**: A good publication will help identify any color changes or losses.

Please provide a more clear image so that a more accurate assessment can be made.
